body:
Guys. It has been 2 years from what I play in this server. I hope you all did a good job. Thanks for 2 years!

I will come back in December 16 (19 day game hiatus).

If there's anything that you've talked to me, I'll check it on the web.

Hope you have a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year!

Thanks for Posighdun for helping me. :D
Thanks for Daisy_Starz for having a great teamwork in this server.

title: 2 years of Avicus

replies.body:
I went on an unintentional 18 day hiatus from Avicus recently. I broke my streak by accident.

Have a good time!
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Happy Christmas, enjoy your time. Is this a temp leaving post?

replies.body: Yes, Rilo. It is a leaving post to all of you. I changed 19 days to 18 days.
replies.body_tagged: Yes, Rilo. It is a leaving post to all of you. I changed 19 days to 18 days.

replies.body: I am going back from now on. I just enjoyed my 14 day hiatus!

replies.body:
There was no need for this post in the first place since it was a temporary leaving post and those are not allowed on the forums, it should have been locked before, and now that you have returned even more so.

Locking...
